post.title: my panasonic g20 optimal settings.
post.content: please remember lads and lasses that these are the settings for my g20. you can give them a go and see what you think. pro 1 contrast 33 (clicks from the left). brightness 31. colour 30. sharpness 0. wb. r-gain +15. b-gain +2. r-cut -9. b-cut +1. all enhancements off. gamma 2.4. these measurments were taken using the eye one lt and may not be suitable for your g20.
